award_title: Decoupling algorithms for fluid-structure interaction problems: Advances in theory, methodology, and applications
subject: FSI solvers people can reuse, not just cite
body:
Finite element code for coupled systems rarely transfersâ€”works on your cluster, breaks everywhere else. Your Schur complement methods get cited but not used.

Built Ouro as an API layer over computational workflows. Other researchers can call your methods directly instead of rebuilding from scratch.

Worth a quick call after holidays?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
